sentences.en: As - hwa s stock prices fall, Chairwoman Kang seeks out Jan Di and threatens her.
sentences.cn: 神话财团的股票因此大跌.姜社长找到了丝草并且威胁她.

sentences.en: Chairwoman Kang and Jae Gyeong are busy preparing for the wedding.
sentences.cn: 姜社长(巫婆)与猴女正在忙碌的准备婚礼.

sentences.en: Primakov was in Japan meeting with the chairwoman of the Socialist Party there.
sentences.cn: 普里马科夫正在日本和那里的社会党女主席会面。

trans.tran_en: a woman who is a chairperson
